languages.text: {n}Абеляр чуть скрипит зубами.{/n} "Это авантюра на грани с ребячеством, но воля ваша, Лорд-капитан. Однако я категорически настаиваю на том, чтобы сопровождать вас".
{n}Abelard grits his teeth slightly.{/n} "An enterprise bordering on the sophomoric, but please yourself, Lord Captain. However, I categorically insist that I escort you."
languages.original_text: {n}Абеляр чуть скрипит зубами.{/n} "Это авантюра на грани с ребячеством, но воля ваша, Лорд-капитан. Однако я категорически настаиваю на том, чтобы сопровождать вас".

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德微微咬紧了牙。{/n}“这几乎算是个幼稚可笑的决定，不过您请便吧，舰长大人。即便如此，我依然坚持要亲自护送您。”
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard grits his teeth slightly.{/n} "An enterprise bordering on the sophomoric, but please yourself, Lord Captain. However, I categorically insist that I escort you."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德微微咬紧了牙。{/n}“这几乎算是个幼稚可笑的决定，不过您请便吧，舰长大人。即便如此，我依然坚持要亲自护送您。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard aprieta ligeramente los dientes.{/n} «Una empresa un tanto pueril, Lord Capitán, pero haga lo que desee. Sin embargo, debo insistir tajantemente en acompañarle».
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard grits his teeth slightly.{/n} "An enterprise bordering on the sophomoric, but please yourself, Lord Captain. However, I categorically insist that I escort you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard aprieta ligeramente los dientes.{/n} «Una empresa un tanto pueril, Lord Capitán, pero haga lo que desee. Sin embargo, debo insistir tajantemente en acompañarle».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}アベラルドはわずかに歯を食いしばる。{/n}「こざかしい娯楽に近いようなものですが、どうぞご自由に、ロード・キャプテン。ですが、我を護衛に必ずお連れください」
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard grits his teeth slightly.{/n} "An enterprise bordering on the sophomoric, but please yourself, Lord Captain. However, I categorically insist that I escort you."

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラルドはわずかに歯を食いしばる。{/n}「こざかしい娯楽に近いようなものですが、どうぞご自由に、ロード・キャプテン。ですが、我を護衛に必ずお連れください」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard beißt leicht die Zähne zusammen.{/n} "Eine Unternehmung, die schon ans Angeberische grenzt, doch tut Euch keinen Zwang an, Lord Captain. Ich bestehe jedoch kategorisch darauf, Euch zu begleiten."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard grits his teeth slightly.{/n} "An enterprise bordering on the sophomoric, but please yourself, Lord Captain. However, I categorically insist that I escort you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard beißt leicht die Zähne zusammen.{/n} "Eine Unternehmung, die schon ans Angeberische grenzt, doch tut Euch keinen Zwang an, Lord Captain. Ich bestehe jedoch kategorisch darauf, Euch zu begleiten."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abélard serre les dents imperceptiblement.{/n} « Une telle démarche me paraît tout à fait injustifiée, mais c'est vous qui voyez, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. En revanche, j'insiste pour vous escorter. »
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard grits his teeth slightly.{/n} "An enterprise bordering on the sophomoric, but please yourself, Lord Captain. However, I categorically insist that I escort you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abélard serre les dents imperceptiblement.{/n} « Une telle démarche me paraît tout à fait injustifiée, mais c'est vous qui voyez, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. En revanche, j'insiste pour vous escorter. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard, dişlerini hafifçe gıcırdatıyor.{/n} "Çocukça bir davranış ama dilediğiniz gibi olsun Lord Kaptan. Her hâlükârda size eşlik etmekte ısrarcı olmak durumundayım."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard grits his teeth slightly.{/n} "An enterprise bordering on the sophomoric, but please yourself, Lord Captain. However, I categorically insist that I escort you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard dişlerini hafifçe gıcırdatıyor.{/n} "Çocukça bir davranış ama dilediğiniz gibi olsun Lord Kaptan. Fakat size eşlik etmekte ısrarcı olmak durumundayım."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
